article.title: Carahsoft to Support Symantec Software for U.S. Army
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Carahsoft Technology Corporation, TVAR Solutions, LLC, McLean, Virginia, was awarded a $19,993,467 firm-fixed-price contract for maintenance services in support of the Symantec software product. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Alexandria, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
